---
title: "TIMCI Day 28 follow-up log"
author: "`r Sys.getenv('TIMCI_INSTITUTION')`"
date: "`r format(Sys.time(), '%Y-%m-%d')`"
params:
  output_dir: tempdir()
  participant_zip: tempdir()
  qual_dir: tempdir()
output:
  html_document: default
  word_document:
    reference_docx: word_styles2.docx
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r ruODK-setup, echo=FALSE}
# Connect to the ODK Central server using ruODK
ruODK::ru_setup(
  svc = Sys.getenv("ODKC_SVC"),
  un = Sys.getenv("ODKC_UN"),
  pw = Sys.getenv("ODKC_PW"),
  tz = Sys.getenv("TZ"),
  verbose = FALSE # Can be switched to TRUE for demo or debugging
)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}

# Create `odk_external_files` folder if it does not exist
dir.create(file.path(params$output_dir, "odk_external_files"), showWarnings = FALSE)
dir.create(file.path(params$qual_dir, "odk_external_files"), showWarnings = FALSE)

# Load contact information
raw_facility_data <- ruODK::odata_submission_get(fid = "01-TIMCI-CRF-Facility")
raw_day28fu_data <- ruODK::odata_submission_get(fid = "01d-TIMCI-CRF-Day28")
facility_data <- timci::process_facility_data(raw_facility_data)
study_data <- timci::extract_enrolled_participants(facility_data)
pii <- timci::extract_pii(study_data)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
day28fu <- timci::generate_fu_log(pii, raw_day28fu_data, 28, 32)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
csv28_fname <- file.path(params$output_dir, "odk_external_files", "day28fu.csv")
write.csv(day28fu, csv28_fname, row.names = FALSE, quote = FALSE)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(qrcode)
for (i in 1:nrow(day28fu)) {
  pid <- toString(day28fu[i,'name'])
  png_file <- file.path(tempdir(), paste0(pid,".png"))
  png(png_file)
  qrcode_gen(pid)
  dev.off()
  }

df <- day28fu %>%
  dplyr::mutate(
    code = paste0('![](', file.path(tempdir(), paste0(day28fu$name,".png")), ')', '{width=0.75in}')
    ) %>%
  dplyr::select('code', dplyr::everything()) %>%
  dplyr::rename('id' = 'name',
                'child' = 'label',
                'date' = 'enroldate',
                'contact' = 'phonenb')

df$caregiver <- paste(df$caregiver,
                      paste0('(',df$relationship,')'))
df$child <- paste(df$child,
                  paste0('(',df$sex,')'))
df$contact <- paste(df$contact,
                  paste0('(',df$location,')'))
drops <- c("mother", "relationship", "sex", "location")
df <- df[ , !(names(df) %in% drops)]
df %>% knitr::kable()
```
